# The Great American   Banana Split Celebration

## It's the Sweetest Thing to Come from Latrobe!

_**August 22-23, 2026**_

#### Don't wait to plan!

#### IT WILL BE HERE BEFORE YOU KNOW IT!

320Days

20Hours

30Minutes

57Seconds

Happening now!

[Parking](https://bananasplitfest.com/information/parking/)

[Event Map](https://bananasplitfest.com/information/event-map/)

[Plan Your Visit](https://bananasplitfest.com/plan-your-visit/)

## Thank you for celebrating with us this year!

## Thank you sponsors!

[![](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Robindale-Logo.jpg)](https://robindale.energy/)

[![](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/Dole-Foods-Logo_Green-Leaf-with-Shadow_PMS-368-3.png)](https://www.dole.com/)

[![](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/Giant_Eagle_logo.svg_.png)](https://www.gianteagle.com/)

[![](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/city-of-latorbe-logo.png)](https://cityoflatrobe.com/)

[![](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/WCAA-Logo-300x171-1.png)](https://www.palmerairport.com/wcaa/)

## [Main Street Realty Group](https://www.realtor.com/realestateagency/632af8847e2a2e81406b7ead)

[![](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Sarah-Crispin-Thomas.png)](https://sarahcrispinthomas.com/)

[![](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/adelphoi.png)](https://www.adelphoi.org/)

[![](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/LCCC.png)](https://loyalhannacc.com/)

[![](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/technimark-Resized-1.png)](https://www.technimark.com/)

[![](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/superior-logo.59a87d08-1-1024x256.png)](https://www.superiormotors.net/)

[![](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Sams-Club.jpg)](https://www.samsclub.com/)

[![](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/svc-web.png)](https://www.stvincent.edu/index.html)

[![](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/fcadvisors.jpg)](https://www.fcbanking.com/personal/investment-services/jodee-harris/)

[![](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/IndependenceHealth_Horizontal625x315.jpg)](https://www.independence.health/)

[![](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/teamlimani-1024x643.png)](https://stephenlimani.myrealtyonegroup.com/)

### Vendors

Sign up to be a featured part of the fun! We love supporting local vendors. Come be part of one of the biggest events of the year!

[Become a Vendor](https://bananasplitfest.com/vendors)

### Sponsors

The Great American Banana Split Celebration couldn‚Äôt have created this weekend without the help of our wonderful sponsors.

[Purchase a Sponsorship](https://bananasplitfest.com/sponsorship-opportunities/)

## Check out some of the amazing talent that will be performing at the festival!

[See the lineup](https://bananasplitfest.com/entertainment)

##### Featured Entertainer

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

##### Featured Entertainer‚Äã

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

##### Featured Entertainer‚Äã

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

## Schedule of Events

Come and see our Banana Split Princesses, Car Show, sweet entertainment, and more!

[Check It Out](https://bananasplitfest.com/schedule/)

## The Story of the All-American Dessert that Started in Latrobe‚Äã

It started in 1904 with an experiment by a local man, David Strickler. Today it is the official dessert of Pennsylvania and an iconic part of American culture. The Great American Banana Split Celebration has been a staple in Latrobe since 2013 and, this year we celebrate its 12-year anniversary!

[Read More](https://bananasplitfest.com/history/)

##### Our Neighborhood Works Together

## Meet The Event Sponsors

It takes a village, or a neighborhood, to create the magic that happens during this fantastic week.

[![event](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/GABSC-logo-without-Sponsors_imageoptim.png)](https://bananasplitfest.com/)

title: 5K Banana Run - Great American Banana Split Celebration
content:
# 5K Banana Run

## Are you ready to run?

## 5k Banana Run:    Because running is bananas!

#### Details

Do you have enough pep in your step to run or walk through historic downtown Latrobe?¬†Make a split for the 5k Banana Run! Whether your running like there‚Äôs a delicious banana split in front of you, or you‚Äôre up for a sweet stroll, it‚Äôs going to be bananas! Keep your eyes peeled on our¬†[social media page](https://www.facebook.com/BananaSplitFest)¬†for additional updates.

- Saturday, August 22, 2025
- Registration at 7am, Kickoff at 9am
- Latrobe Memorial Stadium

[Sponsor HERE](https://bananasplitfest.com/information/sponsorship/)

### Congratulations 2025 Winners

#### Running

**Open Men**

1. Charlie Heese
2. Brandon Melillo
3. Andrew Cenkner

Open Women

1. Jacquelyn Flowers
2. Katie Heese
3. Lynn Armbrust

#### Walking

**Open Men**

1. Joe Adamoski
2. David Gregor
3. Jeff Davis

**Open Women**

1. Mindy McMahen
2. Sarah Pytlak
3. Jan Cutter

#### Age Brackets (For 5k)

- 6-10
- 10-19
- 20-29
- 30-39
- 40-49
- 50-59
- 60+

#### Race Route

**‚Üë** START ‚Äì Memorial Dr

**‚Üí** RIGHT ‚Äì Chestnut Street

**‚Üê** LEFT ‚Äì Jefferson Street

RIGHT ‚Äì Oak Street ‚Äì STAY RIGHT

**‚Üê** LEFT ‚Äì Ligonier Street

**‚Üí** RIGHT ‚Äì E 1st Avenue

**‚Üê** LEFT ‚Äì Penn Avenue

**‚Üê** LEFT ‚Äì Tacoma Avenue

**WATER STATION**

**‚Üê** LEFT ‚Äì Ligonier Street

**‚Üí** RIGHT ‚Äì Oak Street ‚Äì STAY RIGHT

**‚Üê** LEFT ‚Äì Jefferson Street

**‚Üí** RIGHT ‚Äì Chestnut St. Extension

**‚Üê** LEFT ‚Äì Memorial Drive ~ Past Start

**‚Üí** RIGHT ‚Äì Irving Avenue

**‚Üë** PAST ‚Äì Tennis & Volleyball Courts

**‚Üí** RIGHT ‚Äì Stadium Parking Lot Ramp

**‚Üí** RIGHT ‚Äì At the Top of the Ramp

**‚Üê** LEFT ‚Äì Into the Stadium Gates

**‚Üë** STRAIGHT ‚Äì onto the TRACK to the FINISH

[![event](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/GABSC-logo-without-Sponsors_imageoptim.png)](https://bananasplitfest.com/)

title: Sponsorship - Great American Banana Split Celebration
content:
# Sponsorship

## Show your sweet support.

## Sponsorship:     Your opportunity to be the cherry on top!

By sponsoring, not only will you make this event sweeter, but your business will also see a big banana sized boost! There are a variety of opportunities across the various activities happening throughout the weekend, both big, small, and everything in between. Benefits vary across sponsorships, including [home page recognition](https://bananasplitfest.com/), signage, etc., but each sponsor will receive [social media recognition](https://www.facebook.com/BananaSplitFest). Let‚Äôs make the Great American Banana Split Celebration cherished together, we can‚Äôt wait to see you go bananas with us!

- [![5K Banana Run](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/20240824-1B9A0155-300x300.jpg)**5K Banana Run (5)**](https://bananasplitfest.com/product-category/5k-banana-run/)

title: Activities - Great American Banana Split Celebration
content:
# Activities

## Tons of things to do.

## Banana Split Princess

Have the chance to meet the Banana Split Princess and her court throughout the weekend! They will be at various activities, and you can meet them at the Banana Split Princess booth!

[Check It Out](https://bananasplitfest.com/events/princess-pageant/)

## Crafts, Games, & Activities

The Great American Banana Split Celebration has a lively atmosphere filled with crafts, games, and activities for all ages. Kids can enjoy face painting, crafts, and interactive games while parents can shop for handmade crafts, visit the farmers market, or relax with a game of cornhole. For the more adventurous, there‚Äôs even a rock climbing wall!

[Check It Out](https://bananasplitfest.com/activities/crafts-games-activities/)

## Vendors

Visiting the event‚Äôs vendors is a unique and rewarding experience that provides a chance to support the local community and find one-of-a-kind products. They offer a personal touch with friendly staff who are passionate about their products and happy to provide personalized recommendations. With a wide range of options, from handmade crafts to locally-sourced food and drinks, there‚Äôs something for everyone! Discover your new favorites this weekend and come explore all that Latrobe has to offer.

[Check It Out](https://bananasplitfest.com/activities/participating-vendors/)

## Eat & Drink

Discover and enjoy all sorts of yummy treats, from classic celebration food like funnel cakes and corn dogs to fresh eats from local food trucks. Enjoy cold drinks like lemonade or craft beer while listening to live music, creating unforgettable memories and experiencing some good old-fashioned fun!

[Check It Out](https://bananasplitfest.com/activities/food/)

## Entertainment

Featuring live performances from both local and well-known bands, you won‚Äôt want to miss this year‚Äôs entertainment lineup!

[Check It Out](https://bananasplitfest.com/activities/entertainment)

## Over 21 Area

Those over the age of 21 can indulge in a variety of craft brews and local wines, each with its own distinct flavors and character. From hoppy IPAs to rich red wines, there‚Äôs something for every palate. The section offers a more laid-back atmosphere where adults can socialize, unwind, and enjoy the fruits of local breweries and wineries. It‚Äôs a great way to discover new favorites and support the local community while having a fun, relaxing time with friends.

[Check It Out](https://bananasplitfest.com/activities/over-21-area)

[![event](https://bananasplitfest.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/GABSC-logo-without-Sponsors_imageoptim.png)](https://bananasplitfest.com/)

title: Latrobe Art Center Yellow Tie Gala - Great American Banana Split Celebration
